From: Christofor <christofor.d@almaj.eu <mailto:christofor.d@almaj.eu> >

Subject: RE: change of headquarter - Tibiel - april 2024

 

Dear Elena,

 

I am writing to kindly let you that today we have picked up the ANRE Decision which amended Tibiel’s license following the change in HQ – please see the scan copy herein attached. Please let us know if you would like us to mail the original to any address of your choice.

 

Furthermore, folks at ANRE also reminded me of Tibiel’s surplus registered on the ANRE balance sheet (namely RON 14.345,93 which was overpaid). They advised that we should ask for the money to be returned, at least in part, especially if Tibiel forecasts diminished activity in the following year, which would imply a lower ANRE annual contribution due to be paid. Since the estimation stage for the annual ANRE contribution will take place in February next year, I advise that we ask for the return of the RON 11.220,93 amount, thus leaving RON 3.125 which shall cover the estimated contribution invoiced at its minimum amount. To this end, for preparing a short request for returning the payment, I shall need the data of a Romanian bank account of your choice, because ANRE cannot make payments to foreign bank accounts.

 

I shall be awaiting your feedback on the above as well as any other questions you may have.

 

Thank you for your close cooperation,

Kind regards,

Dincescu Christofor

Attorney-at-law |

	
	
	

 



+40 741431327 <tel:+40%20728875686> 



christofor.d@almaj.eu <mailto:christofor.d@almaj.eu>

Dear Ms. Elena,

 

Thank you for your swift response. With regards to the trade registry excerpt, I assume that it has been translated by a Bulgarian translator – this may be a problem from ANRE’s point of view, since they might ask for one translated by a Romanian authorized translator.

 

However, to save costs and time, I shall firstly try it with yours and then, only if they raise any questions, I may have to obtain another one translated here.

 

Thank you for your close cooperation,

Kind regards,

Dincescu Christofor

Attorney-at-law |

From: Christofor <christofor.d@almaj.eu <mailto:christofor.d@almaj.eu> > 
Sent: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 1:58 PM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Office Almaj <office@almaj.eu <mailto:office@almaj.eu> >; Nicoleta Almaj <nicoleta@almaj.eu <mailto:nicoleta@almaj.eu> >
Subject: RE: change of headquarter - Tibiel - april 2024

 

Dear Ms. Elena,

 

I hope this email finds you well, I writing to follow up on the topic below, which seems to have been overlooked for some time after the departure of Mr. Nikolay Hadzhiysky from the Tibiel team.

Specifically, we were about to notify ANRE of the change in headquarters to the new address of 70 Krakra street, postal code 2300, Pernik, Bulgaria – I shall also remind you that notifying ANRE of the change in HQ is mandatory under provisions of ANRE Order 199/2020 on licensing for the natural gas sector and ANRE Order 42/2021 on the general terms and conditions of trading licenses.

 

To proceed with this I shall only need the digitally singed request (please see my comments therein and delete those be) and a scan copy of an updated trade registry excerpt (no older than 30 days old), which we shall then need to translate into Romanian. As I have also written therein, no additional fees shall have to be paid to ANRE, considering that the license amendment fee shall be covered from the surplus registered on the ANRE balance sheet.

 

Moreover, the change shall also have to be notified to Transgaz and the BRM (commodities exchange), I advise proceeding in this direction once/ if you may decide to sign the balancing and PVT access contract for the next (i.e. already current) gas year.

 

Should you have any questions with regards to any of the above, I shall be happy to be of assistance.

 

Kind regards,

Dincescu Christofor

Attorney-at-law |

	
	
	

 



+40 741431327 <tel:+40%20728875686> 



christofor.d@almaj.eu <mailto:christofor.d@almaj.eu> 



www.almaj.eu <https://www.almaj.eu/> 



Sos. Bucuresti – Ploiesti, nr. 1A, Cladirea C, et.1, Sector 1,  Bucharest, Romania

          www.lawyerscooperation.org <http://www.lawyerscooperation.org/> 

From: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu <mailto:alice.i@almaj.eu> > 
Sent: 17 April 2024 11:05
To: n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> ; office@tibiel.com <mailto:office@tibiel.com> 
Cc: Office Almaj <office@almaj.eu <mailto:office@almaj.eu> >; Cosmin T <cosmin.t@almaj.eu <mailto:cosmin.t@almaj.eu> >; Christofor <christofor.d@almaj.eu <mailto:christofor.d@almaj.eu> >; Nicoleta Almaj <nicoleta@almaj.eu <mailto:nicoleta@almaj.eu> >
Subject: change of headquarter - Tibiel - april 2024

 

Dear Nikolay,

 

Kindly find attached the documents related to the change of the headquarters, as follows:

a.	the request for amendment of the license, which should be signed by the legale representatives in 2 original; we shall need the originals;
b.	the informing letter for BRM -  may be digitally signed;
c.	the informing letter for Transgaz – may be digitally signed.

 

Also, please note that it is manadatory to carry out a payment in the amount of 625 Lei, whose proof has to be attached to the request, which should be paid within the bank account: RO98TREZ70020F160300XXXX opened at the Treasury and Public Accounting Activity of the Municipality of Bucharest, Beneficiary: ANRE; fiscal code: 11514848.

 

Further on, please confirm the price of translation for the Trade Registry excerpt – 120 RON (24.14 EUR).

 

Regarding the notification to be sent to BCR, please let me know if you need our assistance on this matter or you shall manage it internally.

 

Should you have any questions on the above, as ever please do not hesitate to let me know.

 

Kindest regards,

 

Alice

 

 

Alice Iordache

Partner |

	
	
	

 



+40 72 <tel:+40%20728875686> 4368567



alice.i@almaj.eu <mailto:alice.i@almaj.eu> 



www.almaj.eu <https://www.almaj.eu/>
